contentfulPagePressRelease.title: HEC Paris to Host 2015 EFMD MENA Conference in Qatar

childMarkdownRemark.html:
HEC Paris will be hosting the 2015 European Foundation for Management Development (EFMD) MENA Conference on 12-14 April in Qatar.

The three-day conference is chaired by Prof Laoucine Kerbache, Dean & CEO, HEC Paris in Qatar. The focus will be on ‘Building Dynamic Networks and Partnerships for the Region’. The event targets Deans, Assistant Deans and Directors of Programmes, as well as Directors of international relations in the Middle East and North Africa Regions.

The conference, held at HEC Paris premises at Tornado Tower in Doha, has a distinguished line-up of speakers.

The EFMD is a global, membership driven organization, based in Brussels, Belgium with offices in Geneva, Hong Kong and Miami. As the largest international network association in the field of management development, the EFMD network includes over 800 institutional members and reaches over 25,000 management development professionals from academia, business, public service and consultancy across 82 countries worldwide.

For the full story, please click here.
